snippet.name: objectselector
snippet.starttext: <seform:objectselector id="$${id}" label="$${label:label}" required="$${required:no|yes}" arrange="$${arrange:horizontal|vertical}" rowid="$${rowid}" labelclass="$${labelclass}" labelstyle="$${labelstyle}" value="$${value:formData[id]}" fieldwidth="$${fieldwidth:275}" currentanchor="$${currentanchor:no|yes}" selectlist="$${selectlist:SITE,FOLDER,PAGE,APPINSTANCE,#application.SEMisc.binaryClassNames#}" visiblelist="$${visiblelist:SITE,FOLDER,PAGE,APPINSTANCE,#application.SEMisc.binaryClassNames#}" selectsubclasses="$${selectsubclasses:no|yes}" onchange="$${onchange}" allowremove="$${allowremove:no|yes}" renderviewmode="$${renderviewmode:objecturl|objectname}" note="$${note}" />
